import React from 'react' import Modal from '../Component/Modal' import { loginAction } from '../Store/Action/LoginAction' import { useDispatch ,useSelector} from 'react-redux' const Login = ({ onClose }) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const submit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const credential = { "email": e.target.email.value, "password": e.target.password.value } loginAction(dispatch, credential) } const logintoken = useSelector(state => state.LoginReducer.x) logintoken?.localStorage.setItem("token", token) return (<>

Login





 ) } export default Login
